I started working at OverInteractive Media working on dimeRocker, a service for putting your Unity games on social networking websites, along with some other useful tools. This has sparked an interest for me to start developing small games for Facebook in my free time.

Here's what I've currently got in the works:

  • Metropolis - Live amongst your friends in a 3D MMO city where you build up your social status.
  • Mad Lab - Single player puzzle game based off the card game Ninety-Nine.
  • Untitled - Resource management game aimed at educating young students in environmental problems.

And here are some pictures of past projects I'll be writing about soon:

Tire and Brimstone
 Sudoku Showdown
 The Crystal Conquest
